title: TCS opens delivery centre in Poland, to double headcount to 1200
description: Poland is home to one of the largest European technology talent pools and the centre will tap into the growing Polish Information and Communication Technology (ICT) talent pool to support the needs of customers in niche technology skills and cognitive business and domain processes, the statement added.
content: Indian IT giant Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) on Friday announced the launch of its new delivery centre in Warsaw, Poland, expanding its operations in the country.
cleaned_content: indian it giant tata consultancy services tcs on friday announced the launch of its new delivery centre in warsaw poland expanding its operations in the country
